This page describes the language pack release schedule for
Ubuntu 11.10 (Oneiric Ocelot). Language pack updates are placed in the regular update
repositories according to a fixed schedule, provided they have been
properly <nowiki>[[Translations-LanguagePackUpdatesQA|tested and signed of on]]</nowiki>.

== Language pack testing and updates for Ubuntu 11.10 (Oneiric Ocelot) ==

The table below describes the schedule for language pack testing and updating. All language pack release dates are an integer number of weeks apart, in order to create a predictable week pattern work flow. The week pattern is a follows:
* Proposed language packs are placed in the proposed repository on Thursdays
* The testing deadlines are on Wednesday
* Tested language packs are released on Thursdays

The language pack release schedule is also available as an <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/ical/jb2k4730cc7obp9fekgbju2tsc%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics|iCal-feed]]</nowiki>. From the link an iCal file can be downloaded for import in various calendar programs (e.g. <nowiki>[[http://library.gnome.org/users/evolution/3.0/usage-calendar-multiple.html.en|Evolution]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/support/calendar/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=37118|Google Calendar]]</nowiki>) or you can subscribe to it (e.g. with <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/support/calendar/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=37100|Google Calendar]]</nowiki>) to stay updated if the schedule changes.
